title: The Man from Snowy River II
brief_description: Jim Craig has been away on the plains droving and gathering a large mob of horses to breed in his high country. Now he has returned to claim his heritage and the woman he loves. “The Man From Snowy River II” continues the legend and brings to life a man whose simple strength will endure forever.
